content.title: Structured Brainstorming Template
content.description: A deterministic approach to brainstorming that uses systematic exploration of solution space. Define constraints, enumerate possibilities within constraints, evaluate each systematically.
examples:
1. Define problem clearly
2. List all constraints
3. Enumerate solution categories
4. For each category, list specific approaches
5. Evaluate each approach against criteria
6. Select best approach deterministically

content.title: Concept Combination Template
content.description: Generate new ideas by systematically combining existing concepts. Take two or more concepts and explore how they can be merged, contrasted, or synthesized.
examples:
Concept A + Concept B = New Hybrid
Example: Memory + Tiers = Memory Tier System
